description:
Riella, who runs a small flower shop, suddenly inherits all the property of Duke Herron, the most powerful jeweler.
Just because of her special 'ability.'

However, there was an original heir who was decided to receive a huge inheritance.
Prince Haun, the king's younger brother and a jeweler, appears in front of Riella, embarrassed by the unexpected inheritance and speaks.

'Everything in Duke Herron name were suppose to be mine. So I'll get it back. Everything, including you.'

***

A long time ago, a ray of light fell on a world where nothing was visible.
The light that spread over the ground became a beautiful flower of color.
The light that spread through the ground became a jewel of a beautiful color.

In this way, light became a flower, a jewel, and each color, and came to be with people>
